PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: Old Shepherd, reputed father of Perdita.
PERDITA, daughter to Leontes and Hermione.
EMILIA, a lady attending on Hermione
Other Lords and Gentlemen, Ladies, Officers, and Servants, Shepherds, and Shepherdesses.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Antechamber in LEONTES' palace.
SCENE II. A room of state in the same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter LEONTES, HERMIONE, MAMILLIUS,
POLIXENES, CAMILLO, and Attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A room in LEONTES' palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter LEONTES, with ANTIGONUS, Lords and others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A prison.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter PAULINA, a Gentleman, and Attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A room in LEONTES' palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter LEONTES, ANTIGONUS, Lords, and Servants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A sea-port in Sicilia.
SCENE II. A court of Justice.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter HERMIONE guarded;
PAULINA and Ladies attending
Re-enter Officers, with CLEOMENES and DION

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LEONTES
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Exeunt PAULINA and Ladies, with HERMIONE

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Bohemia. A desert country near the sea.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter ANTIGONUS with a Child, and a Mariner

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Bohemia. The palace of POLIXENES.
SCENE III. A road near the Shepherd's cottage.
SCENE IV. The Shepherd's cottage.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter Shepherd, Clown, MOPSA, DORCAS, and
others, with POLIXENES and CAMILLO disguised

Music. Here a dance of Shepherds and
Shepherdesses
Here a dance of twelve Satyrs
CAMILLO, FLORIZEL, and PERDITA come forward

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A room in LEONTES' palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter LEONTES, CLEOMENES, DION, PAULINA, and Servants

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LEONTES
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Re-enter CLEOMENES and others, with FLORIZEL and PERDITA

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A chapel in PAULINA'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter LEONTES, POLIXENES, FLORIZEL, PERDITA,
CAMILLO, PAULINA, Lords, and Attendants

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PAULINA
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
PAULINA draws a curtain, and discovers HERMIONE
standing like a statue
